pages.text: Grove Soil is rich, fertile earth infused with arcane energy. It forms the foundation of all botanical magic, providing the necessary environment for magical plants to thrive.

All magical flora requires Grove Soil to properly grow and develop their arcane properties. The soil accelerates growth and nurtures the magical essence within the plants.$(br2)Without Grove Soil, magical seeds will fail to germinate, or worse, lose their magical properties entirely.
To create Grove Soil, you must infuse ordinary dirt with honeycomb. The resulting soil will emit a faint, ethereal glow when magical seeds are planted in it.
